definition: the insured person/the person covered by an insurance policy
to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)
Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)

sentences.english: Proposed Insured must be one of the Insured Person(s).
sentences.chinese: 投保人必須爲其中一名受保人。

sentences.english: Please ensure you have completed all details of all persons to be covered before signing this declaration.
sentences.chinese: 請先填妥所有受保人之資料後，才簽署此聲明。

sentences.english: Necessary arrangement to return deceased Insured's mortal remains to Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 安排運送在外地身亡的受保人遺體返回香港。

sentences.english: For addition of persons to be covered and change of Level of Cover only.
sentences.chinese: 只供增加受保人及更改投保等級者填寫。

sentences.english: Death of the Insured arising from accident or sickness within the Period of Insurance.
sentences.chinese: 受保人於旅程期間因意外或疾病導致死亡。

sentences.english: If Insured more than two persons, please attach a separate sheet.
sentences.chinese: 如受保人多於二人，請另紙詳述。

sentences.english: Pre-Existing Conditions will not be covered for all insurers.
sentences.chinese: 承保範圍並不包括受保人在保單生效前已存在的症狀。

sentences.english: By contrast, Democrats focus on a major expansion of coverage for the uninsured .
sentences.chinese: 相反，民主黨則關注於未受保人保險覆蓋面的擴展。

pinyin: You3 bang1 bao3 xian3 gong1 si1

definition: to suffer (from an illness)/to fall ill
to pay/to hand over (tax payment etc)
permanent resident/person with the right to live in a country or territory
to pay/to hand over (tax payment etc)
